mapper.sql: role_id, role_type, add_type, score, score_cycle, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, deleted, version
mapper.insert:
insert into bbs_score_role (role_type, add_type, score, score_cycle, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, deleted, version) values
(#{item.roleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.addType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.scoreCycle,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.version,jdbcType=BIGINT})
